description: This file defines a CollectionView class that manages a collection of item views, handling rendering, adding, removing, and reordering item views within a parent view, using the Lavaca MVC framework.

classes.name: CollectionView
classes.description: A view for synchronizing a collection of models with sub views, allowing dynamic addition, removal, and reordering of item views.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Initializes and renders all item views based on the current model collection.

methods.name: addItemView
methods.description: Creates a new item view and inserts it into the DOM at the specified index.

methods.name: applyChildViewEvent
methods.description: Adds event listeners to a child view based on the childViewEventMap.

methods.name: removeItemView
methods.description: Removes and disposes of the item view at the specified index.

methods.name: getViewIndexByModel
methods.description: Returns the index of the view associated with a given model.

methods.name: modelFilter
methods.description: Filter function to determine which models are included; defaults to including all.

methods.name: onItemEvent
methods.description: Handles collection events to add, remove, or move item views accordingly.

methods.name: swapViews
methods.description: Swaps two views in the DOM.
